#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sc(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define pr(a) printf("%lld",a)
typedef long long ll;
int a[100000];
int main()
{
	ll n,t,i,j;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			sc(a[i]);
		sort(a,a+n);
		ll ctr=1, maxCtr = 0, elem = a[0];
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(i>0 && a[i]!=a[i-1])
			{
				if(ctr>maxCtr)
				{
					maxCtr = ctr;
					elem = a[i-1];
				}
				ctr = 1;
			}
			if(a[i]==a[i-1])
				ctr++;
		}
		if(maxCtr > n/2)
			pr(elem);
		else
			printf("NO MAJOR");
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
